description: Details required for Condition 16 (Ecological Management Plan) of planning permission 24/02449/FUL (Application under Section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 to carry out development without compliance with Conditions 1 (Approved plans), 26 (Travel Plan), 40 (District Heating details) and 42 (Secured By Design) for Application Reference Number:  22/02295/FUL(Demolition of existing industrial buildings and erection of Care Home (Class C2) comprising lower ground, ground and four upper floors, together with landscaping, amenity spaces, plant, off-street parking, cycle and waste storage and an electrical substation.) dated 06/02/2023. Amendments sought: Variation to Condition 1 to capture minor material amendments proposed within the Design and Access Statement Addendum including changes to internal layout and landscape design, Variation to Conditions 26 and 40 to allow the demolition and site investigation works to proceed independently of the main Design and Build contract award, and Variation to Condition 42 to allow the Secure by Design approval process to occur concurrently with the design and build stages.)
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
